steps.retrieved_evidence:
I think I can help with that!

The answer to your question seems to be "Graveyard of the Pacific". The term "Graveyard of the Pacific" refers to a notorious area off the coast of Oregon, where many ships have met their demise due to treacherous weather conditions and rocky shores.
